channel.title: Vexillum Development Team
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/34g8182.gif[/img]
[b][i][u][size=24pt]Website is Vbulletin so if you apply for website designer, have experience with vbulletin![/size][/u][/i][/b]
Hello, and thanks for clicking on my thread. This thread is about a new project called Vexillum. Vexillum is a RSPS like no other. It is a 317 server loading 525 graphics and 602 animations. We have 634 items, new whip animations, new teleport animations, and tons more to explore. Here are some pictures to give you a little idea of how much fun it is on Vexillum.
[b][i]Credits[/i][/b] Rash - For the base Sanity - For making Project Insanity :P marcbob - For making the banner I Hybrid I - Helping out with server Mr pker01 - Helping out with server Me - For trying to make something out of it
[b]All PVP Armors with correct gfx's and animations[/b] [IMG]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww3/jdc62768/rsps/zuriel1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww3/jdc62768/rsps/vesta1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww3/jdc62768/rsps/statius1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww3/jdc62768/rsps/morrigan1.png[/img]
[b]All Spirit Shields with effects[/b] [IMG]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww3/jdc62768/rsps/elysian1.png[/img][IMG]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww3/jdc62768/rsps/divine1.png[/img][IMG]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww3/jdc62768/rsps/arcane1.png[/img][IMG]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww3/jdc62768/rsps/spectral1.png[/img]
[b]New 634 items[/b] [IMG]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww3/jdc62768/rsps/bank1.png[/img][IMG]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww3/jdc62768/rsps/inventory.png[/img]
[b]Fun Bosses to fight[/b] [IMG]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww3/jdc62768/rsps/tormented.png[/img] [IMG]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww3/jdc62768/rsps/corp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww3/jdc62768/rsps/gwd.png[/img]
[b]And tons more to explore![/b] [IMG]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww3/jdc62768/rsps/teleports1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww3/jdc62768/rsps/warriorsguild.png[/img] [IMG]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww3/jdc62768/rsps/shops.png[/img] [IMG]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww3/jdc62768/rsps/pkteles.png[/img] [IMG]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww3/jdc62768/rsps/pkpshop.png[/img] [IMG]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww3/jdc62768/rsps/gambling.png[/img]
[b][i][u][size=12pt]Server Features[/size][/u][/i][/b] *634 items *Clipped Following *100% Curses *100% Clan Chat *100% Summoning Skill *100% Hunter Skill *100% Agility Skill *Game frame Changeable *Player Owned Shop *100% Duel Arena *100% Warriors Guild *Tormented Demons *100% Pest Control *Corporal Beast *525 Graphics *602 Animations *Face North (Client Feature) *100% Dragon Claws *100% Slayer *Vexillum Point system (By doing slayer, pking, ect.) *PVP Armors *Korasi’s Sword *Torva Armor *100% Stances *Fixed Memleak *Task System *Staff of Light + Arcane Stream Necklace Effect *Chaotic Weapons *100% working EXP counter *EXP Lock *Donator Area *Gambling (Donators Only Feature) *All Spirit Shields *Donator zone *New Teleport Gfx *Edgeville Home *Perfect Switching *Perfect Pking
[b][i][u][size=12pt]Format[/size][/u][/i][/b] [code]Age: Name: What are you applying for: Experience in that field: Proof?: Will you stay dedicated to Vexillum?:[/code]
[b][i][u][size=12pt]Development needed[/size][/u][/i][/b] [b]Server Programmers[/b] 3/3
[b]Graphics Designer[/b] 0/1
[b]Website Designer[/b] 1/2
[b]Advertiser/Helper[/b] 0/3
Here is the end of this thread. Thank you for reading and please post feedback whether you'd like to help or not. Thank you.
NOTE: You CAN apply for more than 1 position!

What are you applying for: Java Programmer
Experience in that field: A couple of months (Around the 8)
Proof?: I owned 3 servers before: Dutchscape, Dutchreality & Torva-X Now am i owning Santa-X
Will you stay dedicated to Vexillum?: Yeh ofc.[/quote]

Accepted, as we are in need of more programmers. My msn is: cheesecake-98@hotmail.com

item.title: Vexillum Development Team
item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum
item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

[quote=“no1toldme2, post:18, topic:401284”] Age: 11
Name: Josh
What are you applying for: Website maker
Experience in that field: Made A couple of websites for a friend
Proof: http://www.shadowworld.smffy.com/index.php?action=forum http://www.killerville.smfnew.com/index.php
Will you stay dedicated to Vexillum?: Yes, probably.[/quote]

We have like 3 people signing up to be website maker so unless you’re really experienced I’m afraid I won’t be needing you. And before you will even be considered to be in the Vexillum development team I don’t want a probably to “Will you stay loyal to Vexillum?” I would like a yes <3

Read full topic

item.title: Vexillum Development Team
item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum
item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

[quote=“visiblesound, post:12, topic:401284”]Age: 18
Name: Trippze
What are you applying for: website designer/Admin(Hidden)
Experience in that field: i will be using simple machines forums for the website and will customize all the different thread branches. I have 10 years experience with forums, and as for admin, I am the most mature and cool guy you’ll meet, and handling disputes will be an easy task for me.
Proof?: i don’t have proof, but why lie for something like this?
Will you stay dedicated to Vexillum?: I will if you do your part. You have to spend money to get servers noticed, if you can spend the money to host and advertise the server, then I’m with you all the way.[/quote]

Accepted. I will do my part but I’m not paying for the server so soon. My last server I payed 30$ a month for a vps and we had like 10 players on.

Read full topic

item.title: Vexillum Development Team
item.dc:creator: @visiblesound visiblesound
item.description:
@visiblesound wrote:

Age: 18
Name: Trippze
What are you applying for: website designer/Admin(Hidden)
Experience in that field: i will be using simple machines forums for the website and will customize all the different thread branches. I have 10 years experience with forums, and as for admin, I am the most mature and cool guy you’ll meet, and handling disputes will be an easy task for me.
Proof?: i don’t have proof, but why lie for something like this?
Will you stay dedicated to Vexillum?: I will if you do your part. You have to spend money to get servers noticed, if you can spend the money to host and advertise the server, then I’m with you all the way.

Read full topic
